message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product!  I think it's worth a lot, so I'm starting the price at $200.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. How about $150?  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $150 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $175.  This is a great deal for a product of this quality.
Alice, I understand your position, but $175 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to meet you in the middle at $162.50.  Let's try to make this work!
